001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.Storage;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.checkbox.CheckboxComponentType;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.checkbox.CheckboxService;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.Insertion;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.CheckboxUiElement;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
010import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
011import java.util.List;
012import org.assertj.core.api.Assertions;
013import org.openqa.selenium.By;
014
015import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.storage.StorageKeysUi.UI;
016
017/**
018 * Provides fluent methods for interacting with checkbox UI elements.
019 *
020 * <p>This class enables structured interactions with checkboxes, supporting actions such as selection,
021 * deselection, validation, and state retrieval. It integrates with {@link CheckboxService} to handle
022 * operations effectively and allows method chaining for better readability.
023 *
024 * <p>The generic type {@code T} represents the fluent UI service that extends {@link UiServiceFluent},
025 * ensuring method chaining returns the correct instance type.
026 *
027 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
028 */
029@SuppressWarnings({"java:S5960", "unchecked"})
030public class CheckboxServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> implements Insertion {
031
032   private final CheckboxService checkboxService;
033   private final T uiServiceFluent;
034   private final Storage storage;
035   private final SmartWebDriver driver;
036
037   /**
038    * Constructs a fluent service for interacting with checkboxes.
039    *
040    * @param uiServiceFluent The parent UI service fluent instance.
041    * @param storage         The storage instance for persisting checkbox states.
042    * @param checkboxService The service handling checkbox interactions.
043    * @param smartWebDriver  The WebDriver instance used for UI interactions.
044    */
045   public CheckboxServiceFluent(T uiServiceFluent, Storage storage, CheckboxService checkboxService,
046                                SmartWebDriver smartWebDriver) {
047      this.checkboxService = checkboxService;
048      this.uiServiceFluent = uiServiceFluent;
049      this.storage = storage;
050      this.driver = smartWebDriver;
051   }
052
053   /**
054    * Selects the specified checkbox element.
055    *
056    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} to be selected.
057    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
058    */
059   public T select(final CheckboxUiElement element) {
060      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Select checkbox with element: " + element);
061      checkboxService.select((CheckboxComponentType) element.componentType(), element.locator());
062      return uiServiceFluent;
063   }
064
065   /**
066    * Deselects the specified checkbox element.
067    *
068    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} to be deselected.
069    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
070    */
071   public T deSelect(final CheckboxUiElement element) {
072      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Deselect checkbox with element: " + element);
073      checkboxService.deSelect((CheckboxComponentType) element.componentType(), element.locator());
074      return uiServiceFluent;
075   }
076
077   /**
078    * Checks if the specified checkbox element is selected.
079    *
080    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} to check.
081    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
082    */
083   public T isSelected(final CheckboxUiElement element) {
084      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Check if checkbox with element " + element + " is selected");
085      boolean selected = checkboxService.isSelected(element.componentType(), element.locator());
086      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selected);
087      return uiServiceFluent;
088   }
089
090   /**
091    * Validates whether the checkbox is selected.
092    *
093    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} to validate.
094    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
095    */
096   public T validateIsSelected(final CheckboxUiElement element) {
097      return validateIsSelected(element, false);
098   }
099
100   /**
101    * Validates whether the checkbox is selected.
102    *
103    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} to validate.
104    * @param soft    If {@code true}, performs a soft assertion.
105    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
106    */
107   public T validateIsSelected(final CheckboxUiElement element, boolean soft) {
108      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Validate if checkbox with element " + element + " is selected");
109      element.before().accept(driver);
110      boolean selected = checkboxService.isSelected(element.componentType(), element.locator());
111      element.after().accept(driver);
112      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selected);
113
114      if (soft) {
115         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
116               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(selected)
117                     .as("Validating checkbox Selected").isTrue()
118         );
119      } else {
120         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
121               () -> Assertions.assertThat(selected)
122                     .as("Validating checkbox Selected").isTrue()
123         );
124      }
125   }
126
127   /**
128    * Checks if multiple checkboxes associated with the given {@link CheckboxUiElement} are selected.
129    * The selection state is stored in the {@link Storage} for future reference.
130    *
131    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} representing the checkbox group or a single checkbox.
132    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
133    */
134   public T areSelected(final CheckboxUiElement element) {
135      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Check if multiple checkboxes with element " + element + " are selected");
136      boolean selected =
137            checkboxService.areSelected((CheckboxComponentType) element.componentType(), element.locator());
138      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selected);
139      return uiServiceFluent;
140   }
141
142   /**
143    * Checks if the specified checkbox element is enabled.
144    *
145    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} to check.
146    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
147    */
148   public T isEnabled(final CheckboxUiElement element) {
149      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Check if checkbox with element " + element + " is enabled");
150      boolean enabled = checkboxService.isEnabled(element.componentType(), element.locator());
151      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
152      return uiServiceFluent;
153   }
154
155   /**
156    * Validates whether the checkbox is enabled.
157    *
158    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} to validate.
159    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
160    */
161   public T validateIsEnabled(final CheckboxUiElement element) {
162      return validateIsEnabled(element, false);
163   }
164
165   /**
166    * Validates whether the checkbox is enabled.
167    *
168    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} to validate.
169    * @param soft    If {@code true}, performs a soft assertion.
170    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
171    */
172   public T validateIsEnabled(final CheckboxUiElement element, boolean soft) {
173      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Validate if checkbox with element " + element + " is enabled");
174      element.before().accept(driver);
175      boolean enabled = checkboxService.isEnabled(element.componentType(), element.locator());
176      element.after().accept(driver);
177      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
178
179      if (soft) {
180         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
181               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(enabled)
182                     .as("Validating checkbox Enabled").isTrue()
183         );
184      } else {
185         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
186               () -> Assertions.assertThat(enabled)
187                     .as("Validating checkbox Enabled").isTrue()
188         );
189      }
190   }
191
192   /**
193    * Checks if multiple checkboxes associated with the given {@link CheckboxUiElement} are enabled.
194    * The enabled state is stored in the {@link Storage} for future reference.
195    *
196    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} representing the checkbox group or a single checkbox.
197    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
198    */
199   public T areEnabled(final CheckboxUiElement element) {
200      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Check if multiple checkboxes with element " + element + " are enabled");
201      boolean enabled = checkboxService.areEnabled((CheckboxComponentType) element.componentType(), element.locator());
202      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
203      return uiServiceFluent;
204   }
205
206   /**
207    * Retrieves the selected values from the checkbox.
208    *
209    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} to retrieve values from.
210    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
211    */
212   public T getSelected(final CheckboxUiElement element) {
213      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Retrieve the selected values from checkbox " + element);
214      List<String> selectedValues = checkboxService.getSelected(element.componentType(), element.locator());
215      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), selectedValues);
216      return uiServiceFluent;
217   }
218
219   /**
220    * Retrieves all checkbox values.
221    *
222    * @param element The {@link CheckboxUiElement} to retrieve all values from.
223    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} for method chaining.
224    */
225   public T getAll(final CheckboxUiElement element) {
226      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Retrieve all checkbox values from " + element);
227      element.before().accept(driver);
228      List<String> allItems = checkboxService.getAll(element.componentType(), element.locator());
229      element.after().accept(driver);
230      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), allItems);
231      return uiServiceFluent;
232   }
233
234   /**
235    * Inserts a value into a checkbox element.
236    *
237    * @param componentType The type of the checkbox component.
238    * @param locator       The locator of the checkbox element.
239    * @param values        The values to be inserted.
240    */
241   @Override
242   public void insertion(final ComponentType componentType, final By locator, final Object... values) {
243      Allure.step("[UI - Checkbox] Insert a value into checkbox " + locator + " of type " + componentType);
244      checkboxService.insertion(componentType, locator, values);
245   }
246
247}
